description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up environment variables, initializing notification services, and configuring providers and app theme.

classes.name: EventManagerApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, responsible for initializing services and setting up providers and themes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; runs the EventManagerApp widget.

methods.name: _initialize
methods.description: Asynchronously loads environment variables and initializes notification services before rendering the app.
